_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_INDUSTRY


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: February 22 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for excellent foggy and twilight industrial-themed map [de_industry](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/34847) by Moroes (released September 2007).
It's a fully created from scratch and precisely hand-tuned .nav-file (because both known nav-files by Moroes and CoCoNUT were not quite playable).

Well, bots have an access to all possible pathways now, including an underground tunnel and other places inaccessible earlier.

Also this Navigation Mesh was fully Place Painted.

Fight and Survive! Use night vision and prick up ears... or wait while fog will dissipate :D

Credits and Gratitudes:
   Moroes (for his terrible and thrilled industrial-themed map).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Stoneface dog, swirling fog, gates open on the dark dark night! :-)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

**UPDATED 26.11.2014**

General Fixes:
- Place Names are changed (replaced on more corresponding to environment);
- Some other minor improvements.

**PLEASE REDOWNLOAD UPDATED ARCHIVE!**
